post.title: Band Boosters By-laws and IRS Form 990
post.description:
Dear North Royalton High School Band Booster Member,
Please find attached the following two docume
post.content:
Dear North Royalton High School Band Booster Member,

Please find attached the following two documents:

  • Bylaws
    These are distributed annually to band booster members and contain meaningful information about the organization's governance.
    NRBandBoostersBy-Laws.pdf (401.9KB)
  • IRS Form 990
    Our annual tax return is the IRS Form 990, and this one is for the fiscal year ended June 30, 2014. Upon filing, it becomes a public document and as is our practice, it is being distributed to you in advance.
    NRBandBoostersTaxForm990.pdf (1.4MB)
